markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs=""
>
[Dread](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1252)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Eerie symbols cover your armor, inspiring terror in your foes. Frightened enemies within 30 feet that can see you must attempt a DC 20 Will save at the end of their turn; on a failure, the value of their [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition doesn't decrease below 1 that turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dread (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dread (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 1,800 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC is 29, and the value of affected enemies' frightened condition doesn't decrease below 2.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Dread (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 21,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC is 38, and the value of affected enemies' frightened condition doesn't decrease, no matter the value.
name: Dread (Lesser)
